summary: The diff updates AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx to reference a new logo image, but uses the filename 'app-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead of the required 'app-logo.png'. The actual PNG asset file is not added to the repository. The requirement specifies saving the file at 'frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.png', but no such file appears in the diff (no files were added).

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the new logo as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.png
missing_requirements.reason: No new file was added in the diff. The ADDED FILES section shows 'none', meaning the actual PNG asset was never saved to the repository.

Both AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx reference '/assets/generated/app-logo.dim_256x256.png' instead of the required '/assets/generated/app-logo.png'. The path does not match the specified asset filename.
